description: A juicy steak and gourmet salad don't have to cost the earth. Try this budget-friendly steak and lentil salad recipe for a scrumptious weeknight dinner.
keywords: Beef Steak With Lentil & Capsicum Salad
name: Beef Steak With Lentil & Capsicum Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place tomato, capsicums, cucumber, lentils, rocket and remaining honey mixture in a large bowl. Season with pepper and toss to combine. Serve beef with salad and sourdough.
